title: ISic003518. Epitaph for [---]a Ti. f. (?)
body:
Facsimile Images

[Dis Ma]nibus
[---]a Ti(berii) f(ilia) ((·)) v(ixit) ((·)) a(nnis) ((·)) XIV ((·)) m(ensibus) ((·)) V
[---]ḅịḷḷị M R
[---poste]risque ((·)) suis
5[---]ạ moneta ((·))
[---]ṿaleas

Apparatus criticus

Text according to IMusMessina 9 and EDR100007

English translation

To the spirits of the departed. [...]a, daughter of Tiberius, lived for 14 years and 5 months. [...]bili[...]M[...]R [...] and for his children [...]. Take care (?).

Italian translation

Agli spiriti dei defunti. [...]a, figlia di Tiberius, visse per 14 anni e 5 messi. [...]bili[...]M[...]R [...] e per i suoi figli [...]. Riguardati (?).

commentary

bibliography

    2005.0667 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283 9 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000029 Orsi 1916 147 fig.20 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001701 Solin 2005 197-198 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001423
